file_insights.primary_responsibility: Google Tag Manager and consent management client component

patterns_discovered: Conditional script rendering based on consent state
Use of Next.js Script component for performance optimization
Modular consent management through custom hook (useConsent)
Default denied state for ad and analytics storage
gotchas_discovered: Hardcoded tracking IDs (G-53QMDPJ, GTM-53QMDPJ) which might need environment configuration
Debug mode is enabled which might not be suitable for production

approach_outcome.implementation_completeness: Full implementation of Google Analytics component

recommendations: Replace hardcoded tracking IDs with environment variables
Consider extracting GTM and consent script logic into separate utility functions
Add error handling for script loading and consent updates
